title: This maokai bug...
body: What is this bug and why the hell is it taking so long to fix. I wanna play my lumpy op tree much sad

replies.body: what heartvine said go google it if you want to know more

I went and checked the NA boards when I noticed Maokai was disabled and it seems the bug is that he became untargetable at times, still able to attack and use abilities but unable to move and untargetable. You can imagine it's a pretty game changing bug.
